messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-Notifications package?
The ComfyUI-Notifications package provides custom nodes to ComfyUI to notify users when workflows have completed.
Is the ComfyUI-Notifications package also available via ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts?
Yes, the tools in ComfyUI-Notifications package are also available via ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts, but ComfyUI-Notifications comes without the bloat of other tools.
What does the 'Send Notification' node in ComfyUI-Notifications do?
The 'Send Notification' node in ComfyUI-Notifications sends a system notification via the browser.
What is the function of the 'Play Sound' node in ComfyUI-Notifications?
The 'Play Sound' node in ComfyUI-Notifications plays a chime sound to notify the user.
What does the 'Webhook' node in ComfyUI-Notifications do?
The 'Webhook' node in ComfyUI-Notifications sends a webhook to the specified URL. It supports customizing JSON body with the 'json_format' template.
What is the purpose of the 'Unified Notification' node in ComfyUI-Notifications?
The 'Unified Notification' node in ComfyUI-Notifications supports multiple notification types in one node for convenience.
Does the ComfyUI-Notifications package support multiple types of notifications?
Yes, the ComfyUI-Notifications package supports system notifications, sound notifications, webhook notifications, and a unified notification node that supports multiple types in one node.
